tools.wrap_to_360¶

tools.wrap_to_360(angle)¶

Wraps the given angle(s) to 360.

Parameters:

angle (int, float, list[int], list[float], iterable[int], iterable[float]) – The values to wrap.

Returns:

The wrapped values

Return type:

int, float, list[int], list[float], iterable[int], iterable[float]

Raises:

TypeError – If the input data type is unsupported.
